titles.title: Veterans Benefits Improvement Act of 2022
Veterans Benefits Improvement Act of 2022
To amend title 38, United States Code, to improve benefits administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Veterans Benefits Improvement Act of 2022
This bill implements programs and policies related to veterans' benefit claims.
